original_title: Jazz Mix - 8 Jazz Concerts Live in NYC
overview: 8 hours of live jazz concerts for the first time on a double-Blu-Ray disc. 8 NYC bands filmed by a French crew in New-York on October 2008 in the finest jazz clubs in New York. Using HD multi-cams and mixed in Dolby Surround at the famous MSM Studio in Munich.  AMBROSE AKINMUSIRE 5TET @ JAZZ STANDARD // 52' THE JASON LINDNER BIG BAND @ ZINC CLUB // 58' VAL INC - MARVIN SEWELL - JOWEE OMICIL @ DROM CLUB // 62' JALEEL SHAW 5TET @ JAZZ GALLERY // 59' FIELDWORK @ LE POISSON ROUGE // 52' NASHEETWAITS, ERICMC PHERSON & ABRAHAMBURTON @ KNITTING FACTORY // 52' THEO BLECKMANN & KNEEBODY @ JOE'S PUB // 59' CHRIS DAVE & FRIENDS @ HIP HOP CULTURAL CENTER OF HARLEM // 52'
title: Jazz Mix - 8 Jazz Concerts Live in NYC
